languages.text: Даргонус продолжал расти и крепнуть, пока, спустя два десятилетия, страшное восстание не разрушило его процветание. Генетическая мерзость, именуемая культом генокрадов, просочилась в ульи Даргонуса и попыталась захватить мир. Миллионы были истреблены в чистках, уличные бои разрушили многие ульи, отбросив Даргонус на века в прошлое и лишив перспективы стать столицей Простора.

Dargonus continued to grow for two decades until a terrifying rebellion put a decisive end to its prosperity. A genetic abomination known as the Genestealer Cult infiltrated the hives of Dargonus and tried to take over the world. Millions were exterminated in purges and street battles destroyed many hives, setting Dargonus back centuries and depriving it of its chance to become the capital of the Expanse.

Генетическая мерзость, именуемая культом генокрадов, просочилась в ульи Даргонуса и попыталась захватить мир. Миллионы были истреблены в чистках, уличные бои разрушили многие ульи, отбросив Даргонус на века в прошлое и лишив перспективы стать столицей Простора.

languages.text: 达戈努斯持续发展了二十年，但随后爆发了一场可怕的叛乱，它的繁荣也戛然而止。一个被称为“基因窃取者教团”的邪教渗透到了达戈努斯的巢都之中，试图掌控这个世界。几百万人在巷战与大清洗中丧命，许多巢都遭到了摧毁。这场事故让达戈努斯倒退了几个世纪，也彻底失去了成为整个科罗努斯扩区首都的机会。
languages.original_text: Dargonus continued to grow for two decades until a terrifying rebellion put a decisive end to its prosperity. A genetic abomination known as the Genestealer Cult infiltrated the hives of Dargonus and tried to take over the world. Millions were exterminated in purges and street battles destroyed many hives, setting Dargonus back centuries and depriving it of its chance to become the capital of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯持续发展了二十年，但随后爆发了一场可怕的叛乱，它的繁荣也戛然而止。一个被称为“基因窃取者教团”的邪教渗透到了达戈努斯的巢都之中，试图掌控这个世界。几百万人在巷战与大清洗中丧命，许多巢都遭到了摧毁。这场事故让达戈努斯倒退了几个世纪，也彻底失去了成为整个科罗努斯扩区首都的机会。

languages.text: ダルゴナスは20年もの間繁栄を続けたが、恐ろしい反乱軍によって、その栄華は終わりを遂げた。ジーンスティーラー・カルトという遺伝的に嫌悪されている組織が、ダルゴナスのハイヴに侵入して惑星の乗っ取りを企む。何百万もの住人が粛清されて絶滅し、市街地戦で多くのハイヴが破壊され、ダルゴナスを数世紀前の状態に戻して、エクスパンスの首都となるチャンスを奪ったのだ。
languages.original_text: Dargonus continued to grow for two decades until a terrifying rebellion put a decisive end to its prosperity. A genetic abomination known as the Genestealer Cult infiltrated the hives of Dargonus and tried to take over the world. Millions were exterminated in purges and street battles destroyed many hives, setting Dargonus back centuries and depriving it of its chance to become the capital of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスは20年もの間繁栄を続けたが、恐ろしい反乱軍によって、その栄華は終わりを遂げた。ジーンスティーラー・カルトという遺伝的に嫌悪されている組織が、ダルゴナスのハイヴに侵入して惑星の乗っ取りを企む。何百万もの住人が粛清されて絶滅し、市街地戦で多くのハイヴが破壊され、ダルゴナスを数世紀前の状態に戻して、エクスパンスの首都となるチャンスを奪ったのだ。

languages.text: Dargonus continua de se développer durant deux décennies, jusqu'à ce qu'une révolte terrible mette un coup d'arrêt à sa prospérité. Une abomination génétique appelée le Culte Genestealer infiltra ses ruches et tenta de s'emparer du monde. Des millions de personnes furent exterminées au cours de purges et des combats de rue causèrent la destruction de nombreuses ruches, ce qui provoqua un recul de plusieurs siècles sur Dargonus et priva la planète de sa chance de devenir la capitale des Étendues.
languages.original_text: Dargonus continued to grow for two decades until a terrifying rebellion put a decisive end to its prosperity. A genetic abomination known as the Genestealer Cult infiltrated the hives of Dargonus and tried to take over the world. Millions were exterminated in purges and street battles destroyed many hives, setting Dargonus back centuries and depriving it of its chance to become the capital of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus continua de se développer durant deux décennies, jusqu'à ce qu'une révolte terrible mette un coup d'arrêt à sa prospérité. Une abomination génétique appelée le Culte Genestealer infiltra ses ruches et tenta de s'emparer du monde. Des millions de personnes furent exterminées au cours de purges et des combats de rue causèrent la destruction de nombreuses ruches, ce qui provoqua un recul de plusieurs siècles sur Dargonus et priva la planète de sa chance de devenir la capitale des Étendues.

languages.text: Dargonus siguió creciendo durante dos décadas hasta que una horrible rebelión acabó definitivamente con su prosperidad. Una abominación genética conocida como Culto Genestealer se infiltró en las colmenas de Dargonus y trató de hacerse con el mundo. Las purgas exterminaron a millones y las batallas por las calles destruyeron muchas colmenas, lo que hizo retroceder siglos a Dargonus y le arrebató la posibilidad de convertirse en capital de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Dargonus continued to grow for two decades until a terrifying rebellion put a decisive end to its prosperity. A genetic abomination known as the Genestealer Cult infiltrated the hives of Dargonus and tried to take over the world. Millions were exterminated in purges and street battles destroyed many hives, setting Dargonus back centuries and depriving it of its chance to become the capital of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus siguió creciendo durante dos décadas hasta que una horrible rebelión acabó definitivamente con su prosperidad. Una abominación genética conocida como Culto Genestealer se infiltró en las colmenas de Dargonus y trató de hacerse con el mundo. Las purgas exterminaron a millones y las batallas por las calles destruyeron muchas colmenas, lo que hizo retroceder siglos a Dargonus y le arrebató la posibilidad de convertirse en capital de la Extensión.

languages.text: Dargonus wuchs noch etwa zwei Jahrzehnte, bis ein schrecklicher Aufstand seinem Wohlstand ein abruptes Ende bereitete. Eine genetisches Abscheulichkeit namens Symbiontenkult infiltrierte die Makropolen von Dargonus und versuchte, die Welt zu übernehmen. Millionen wurden bei Reinigungsaktionen ausgelöscht, und Straßenkämpfe zerstörten viele Makropolen, was Dargonus um Jahrhunderte zurückwarf und ihm jede Chance nahm, Hauptwelt der Ausdehnung zu werden.
languages.original_text: Dargonus continued to grow for two decades until a terrifying rebellion put a decisive end to its prosperity. A genetic abomination known as the Genestealer Cult infiltrated the hives of Dargonus and tried to take over the world. Millions were exterminated in purges and street battles destroyed many hives, setting Dargonus back centuries and depriving it of its chance to become the capital of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus wuchs noch etwa zwei Jahrzehnte, bis ein schrecklicher Aufstand seinem Wohlstand ein abruptes Ende bereitete. Eine genetisches Abscheulichkeit namens Symbiontenkult infiltrierte die Makropolen von Dargonus und versuchte, die Welt zu übernehmen. Millionen wurden bei Reinigungsaktionen ausgelöscht, und Straßenkämpfe zerstörten viele Makropolen, was Dargonus um Jahrhunderte zurückwarf und ihm jede Chance nahm, Hauptwelt der Ausdehnung zu werden.

languages.text: Yirmi yıl kadar daha büyüyen Dargonus'taki refah dönemi, çıkan bir ayaklanmayla kesin olarak sona erdi. Gençalan Tarikatı olarak bilinen genetik odaklı bir grup, Dargonus'un kovanlarına sızıp dünyayı ele geçirmeye çalıştı. Arındırmalar sırasında milyonlarca kişi öldü, sokaklardaki muharebelerde sayısız kovan yıkıldı. Yüzyıllar kaybeden Dargonus, Enginlik'in başdünyası olma şansını tamamen yitirdi.
languages.original_text: Dargonus continued to grow for two decades until a terrifying rebellion put a decisive end to its prosperity. A genetic abomination known as the Genestealer Cult infiltrated the hives of Dargonus and tried to take over the world. Millions were exterminated in purges and street battles destroyed many hives, setting Dargonus back centuries and depriving it of its chance to become the capital of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus yirmi yıl boyunca büyümeyi sürdürdü ancak yaşanan bir isyan, bu refaha kesin bir şekilde son noktayı koydu. Genhırsızı Tarikatı olarak bilinen genetik odaklı bir grup, Dargonus'un kovanlarına sızdı ve dünyayı ele geçirmeye çalıştı. Arındırmalar sırasında milyonlarca kişi öldü ve sokaklardaki muharebeler nedeniyle sayısız kovan yok oldu. Dargonus yüzyıllarca geriye gitti ve Enginlik'in başdünyası olma şansını tamamen kaybetti.
